StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertContractGoal]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@FiscalYear int ,@OrgID int ,@Contrac.ngMissionType varchar(6) ,@January int ,@February int ,@March int ,@April int ,@May int ,@June int ,@July int ,@August int ,@September int ,@October int ,@November int ,@December int ,@UserLogin varchar(15))
AS
if @Contrac.ngMissionType = 'MCRC' SET @Contrac.ngMissionType = 'CMC';
-- January IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 1 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @January ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 1 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 1, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @January, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- February IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 2 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @February ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 2 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 2, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @February, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- March IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 3 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @March ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 3 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 3, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @March, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- April IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 4 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @April ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 4 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 4, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @April, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- May IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 5 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @May ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 5 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 5, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @May, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- June IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 6 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @June ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 6 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 6, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @June, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- July IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 7 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @July ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 7 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 7, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @July, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- August IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 8 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @August ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 8 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 8, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @August, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- September IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 9 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @September ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 9 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 9, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @September, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- October IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 10 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @October ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 10 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 10, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @October, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- November IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 11 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @November ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 11 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 11, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @November, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- December IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 12 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @December ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 12 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 12, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @December, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
